Key:
All right. I'm heading to school, just as Kotori
told me, but...

Nothing new is happening. I didn't bump into
anyone around any corners... I thought I'd go
through all that again.

At this rate, I'm really not going to be able to
differentiate it from reality.

Come to think of it... Arusu, are you going to
school with me?
Yes. It is my role to observe Shido Itsuka.
So you're going to be a transfer student?

The NPCs won't notice me. That is how the system
is set.
I don't really get it, but...
Yo, Itsuka! Looking the typical amount of dumb～

What's your problem? Did you eat something weird
this morning?
No. I'm 100% perfect, as usual.

I just hate you for always flirting with
Tohka-chan and Tobiichi.
So that makes me a healthy high school student.
I'm not flirting with them...
Huh? Hey, Tonomachi. Can you not see this girl?
Huh? Oh, you mean Arusu-san?
You know Arusu?

Well yeah, kinda... Oh, I think the bell's about
to ring. Let's do it to it, Itsuka!
O-Okay... Go on ahead.
Don't be late～

So he can see Arusu and recognize her... But he
was acting weird. He's not ignoring her, just not
really acknowledging her.

NPCs recognize me but won't find it odd that I'm
here. And they don't really acknowledge my
presence. That is how the system is designed.

I see... So this Tonomachi was an NPC? It's hard
to tell the difference between him and the real
one... Except that he'd ignore you, Arusu.

Is it really odd that Hiroto Tonomachi wouldn't
react to me?

Well, yeah. The moment he sees a pretty girl like
you, he'll make a point of it to find ways to talk
to you.
Pretty... girl?

Oh, do you not know that, either? Uh, it means
like, cute or pretty. Arusu... I guess for your
case it would be cute?

Cute... Puppies and babies are cute, right?
Because they look weak?

Whaat? No, it's not like that... I mean, yes,
puppies and babies are adorable, but... Hm...
How do I explain what cute is...?

Cute... Loveable, you should love... Such meaning
is tied to it as well.
Exactly, I think you're cute, Arusu.

I-I'm... cute? Shido Itsuka, do you really think
I'm cute?
Huh? Yeah, I do. You're cute, Arusu.

I-I'm... cute. I should be happy... but I'm also
embarrassed.

You don't have to be embarrassed. I think anyone
who sees you would think you're cute.
Anyone... who sees me?
Yes, I'm sure of it!
I see. Understood.

(Huh... She seemed bummed for some reason.
A reaction like that from Arusu is rather rare.)

Oh, the bell just rang. I'm going to class... Are
you coming, too?
Yes, I will.

Sounds good. I keep forgetting we're inside a game
since everything feels so natural.
Oh, crap. Let's hurry.
Oh, it's Itsuka-kun. Good morning～
Yo, yo. You sure are taking your sweet time～
Hey, you! You'd better hurry, or you'll be late!

Same goes for you guys! Why aren't you hurrying
up?
Oh, do you not know?

What a noob analysis, Watson-kun.
Our last names are...

Do you remember? Hm? Or do you only remember
us as Ai-Mai-Mii? Can you say our full names?
Let's hear it.

G-God, so annoying... Yamabuki, Hazakura,
Fujibakama. Right?
Exactly! I'll give you a candy.

And the answer is pretty clear, Watson-kun. When
they do roll call, I have until Ha" to get there."
But Itsuka-kun, you're "It"!

Oh, you mean name order, huh... We don't have very
long before it's us next.
Tama-chan takes her time when she does it.
So, the difference between Ha" and "I" is...
So vague! Kind of like us!
Shut up! Argh, Arusu, let's hurry!
...Okay.
Good morning, Itsuka-kun. You barely made it～
I'm sorry, Tama-cha... I mean Okamine-sensei.

Honestly, you are late. But... Since it looks like you
ran here, so I'll let it slide this time.
Thank you!
Hehe... Because...

Seeing a male high school student running...
sweating, breathing ruggedly...
It makes my heart pound.
(Uh, I'm going to pretend I didn't hear that.)

*Sigh*... It's still morning, but I'm already
exhausted.
Shido! Good morning!
...Shido, morning.

Oh, Tohka, Origami, morning. Wasn't it confusing
for you guys too, it being morning all of a
sudden?

Hm... No, I'm fine. Kotori explained it to me
before I left home. She told us to just be our
usual selves!

It's fine on my end as well. I came here to be by
your side, Shido.
I see. Thanks, you two...
Leave it to me! I will be the one to protect you!

Thank you... So this is how you use words of
appreciation.
Thank you is a phrase of appreciation. When\nsomeone says it to you... it's happy and warm.
...Warm? The heart becomes warm...

This is mystical... I never thought of things this
way...
(...The morning classes proceeded normally.)

(Arusu's seat was one that didn't exist in the
real world, but as she pointed out, no one seemed
to find it odd for her to be there.)
It's lunch break now... Seems like any other day.

Everyone else is supposedly an NPC, but they're
all just like their usual selves.
I'm seriously going to forget that I'm in a game.
All right, Shido! It's time to eat!

All right, I brought your lunch, Tohka. And yours
too, Arusu.

Hm? Then you made more than usual? There's some
for Kotori, right?

Well, there's not much difference between making
three or four.

Oh, is that so? That's interesting. I thought you
would have to work more.

Shido, you should eat lunch with me. The presence
of a loud, annoying thing like Tohka Yatogami will
decrease your metabolism and cause you stress.

Th-That's not true! Shido likes to eat lunch with
me. It makes lunch that much more delicious!

There are no grounds to support that statement.
If that is in fact accurate, please cite your
sources.

Hehe... You are quite foolish, Origami Tobiichi!
Listen to me carefully: When I eat with Shido,
lunch tastes more delicious than usual.

That's your point of view and has nothing to do
with Shido. It isn't sufficient enough evidence on
which to base your argument.

Sh-Shido feels the same way, too! I know it...
A-Am I wrong... Shido...?

You're not wrong. It's more fun to eat with people
than to eat alone. And when it's fun, the food
tastes better.

Hehe. Take that, Origami Tobiichi. That's what
Shido said!

Shido is just being nice. My focus is on Shido's
emotional and physical health. If needed, I am
willing to do maintenance on him.
Maintenance...?

A physical and mental wellness check. Massage...
and things only couples can do.
What? What's that?!

Hehe... The day is at its peak. The sun is full.
Let us enjoy the joys of the afternoon together!
Suggestion. Eat lunch with us.

Grr, the Yamais came, too! Shido is going to eat
with me.

You came to that conclusion too quickly. We can
pretty much say that it's just Tohka Yatogami's
fantasy.

Okay, okay! Calm down, you guys! Let's all just
eat together!

Come on, put the desks together. Lunch will taste
much better if we all eat together! These two even
came from another class, you know...
...Shido Itsuka, I have a question.
Hm? What is it?

...Is this that phrase, fighting over you—also
known as a harem situation?

Harem?! Well I guess considering the situation,
you could say that, but... No, no, no, it's not
like that!

Then shouldn't you decide on only one person?
It appears that they wish for you to do so.

Well, it's dumb to fight over something like this.
And besides... like I said earlier, food is best
when eaten as a group.

I see... The taste of food has a higher priority
over love.

Well, I think that's a different subject... And if
you really think about it, this is just their
usual thing.
Their usual thing...

(And just like that, our boisterous lunch ended,
and afternoon classes went by as usual.)
Phew... Class is over.

It was rowdy, but I guess it's just like... usual.
I never felt like I was in a gal game at all.
But I guess that's good.
Shido Itsuka. Is school over?

Yes, I'm not in any clubs, either. Since this was
just a typical day, was it too boring for you?

Boring... I do not understand that. It just...
feels as though something is lacking.
Lacking?

I want to know what love is. Fighting over you in
the afternoon... That was truly intriguing.

However, you didn't choose any of them. So love
could not be formed. That is what I presume.

Well, I don't think it's right to pick that moment
specifically...

Shido Itsuka. Please tell me your choice. And
could you show me?
Show you... what?

Something different from usual. Something among
the unusual, would you be able to fall for this
opponent the same way?
What are you talking about?

The shape of love. What is love? Beyond your
choice is an unusual—
Aru...su?
